step.datasource: select top 100 percent C.id, C.cnt_ID, textfield2 AS OLD_T2, CASE WHEN S.Id IS NULL THEN 'non-confirmed' ELSE CASE WHEN S.Bounced = 1 THEN 'bounced' WHEN S.Unsubscribed = 1 THEN 'unsubscribed' WHEN S.Confirmed = 1 THEN 'confirmed' ELSE 'non-confirmed' END END AS TextField2, -- optin textfield4 AS OLD_T4, SUBSTRING(ISNULL(S.Subscriptions,''),0,80) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AS TextField4 -- classification, FROM [orlaco]..cicntp C WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [ExactData].._ST_IC_Subscribers S WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.cnt_email = S.Email COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE S.Deleted = 0 AND ( (textfield2 IS NULL OR textfield2 != (CASE WHEN S.Bounced IS NULL THEN 'non-confirmed' ELSE CASE WHEN S.Bounced = 1 THEN 'bounced' WHEN S.Unsubscribed = 1 THEN 'unsubscribed' WHEN S.Confirmed = 1 THEN 'confirmed' ELSE 'non-confirmed' END END )) OR ( ISNULL(textfield4, '') != SUBSTRING(ISNULL(S.Subscriptions,''),0,80) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT))
step.stepname: Update Synergy Contacts with IConneqt data

step.datasource: select DISTINCT TOP 1000 C.id, C.cnt_ID, textfield2 AS OLD_T2, 'deleted' AS TextField2 -- optin FROM [orlaco]..cicntp C WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [ExactData].._ST_IC_Subscribers S WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.cnt_email = S.Email COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE S.Deleted = 1 AND C.ID NOT IN (SELECT C.ID FROM [orlaco]..cicntp C WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [ExactData].._ST_IC_Subscribers S WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.cnt_email = S.Email COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE S.Deleted = 0) AND (textfield2 != 'deleted')
step.stepname: Update Synergy Contacts with DELETED IConneqt data
